class montecarlo.IsingHamiltonian(J=[[()]], mu=array([0.]))[source]

Class for an Ising Hamiltonian of arbitrary dimensionality

\[H = \sum_{\left<ij\right>} J_{ij}\sigma_i\sigma_j + \sum_i\mu_i\sigma_i\]
